Reviews.Title: “AVOID THIS PROPERTY - MANAGEMENT IS NOT HONEST”

Reviews.Content: reservations using third party reservation company hotel manager honor rate didnt matter printed confirmation bookingcom alexandra charge whatever insisted raising rates 30 saturday sunday nights reason ok discounted rates 3 nights cant trust management regarding rates suggest taking business elsewhere plenty honest hotels las vegas
